"A.P.241/3/31/12:00": "Oh, hi <%me>... Oh, crap, this is bad!"
"Those guys over there! Group of four!"
"Yeah, student council members from my school. In other words, they're Mother Cluster members."
"<%me>, they might seem like enemies, but they're not. They're just student council members from my school. In other words, they're part of Mother Cluster."
"They're doing the same thing I was before you met me; investigating this world through the eyes of their avatars. They're conducting research."
"Are they gone? They are? Phew! I'm so glad they didn't see me!"
"If they're your friends, then shouldn't you go see them?"
"I, uh... left Mother Cluster. So I can't just walk up and say \"Hi!\" or anything."
"I mean... Because they might see me as a traitor or enemy."
"Now that I'm thinking about it, I've no idea how my disappearance is being explained at school."
"I'd certainly deserve the consequences, but I REALLY hope I wasn't expelled!"
